transcript.text: Saturday August 26 Jordan here and I
just want to fill in this quick update
for you guys to check in because I
haven't really done as many videos this
week as I've wanted to you know I
figured that me coming back from the
conference I was at last weekend in
Mount Shasta that things would wind down
a little bit and I'd get plenty of time
to relax and work on videos and whatnot
but things have been getting crazy if
not more crazy getting home after the
conference then beforehand now this
isn't necessarily a bad thing there's a
lot of great stuff going on things that
I have yet to share with you guys that I
will very soon but one thing that I did
want to discuss with you just in this
short update is the passing of William
Tompkins that's one reason why I took a
short you know a few day video hiatus
when I came home just to recuperate my
own mental state get myself balanced
before I started doing these again
because one of the things that did knock
me out or you know set me back a little
bit was the passing of William Tompkins
if you don't know who William Tompkins
is he was a whistleblower or an insider
if you will who came forth it was
actually encouraged to come forth by
some of his cohorts back in 2015 to
begin disclosing his experiences with
secret space program what's really gone
on not only in our military but on the
planet since World War two essentially
you know he was 94 years old very
amazing man very amazing soul you know
if you ever listened to one of his
interviews or one of his lectures he was
deeply concerned about the brainwashing
especially that you know young people my
generation young adults are undergoing
so he was very adamant that you know
everything mainstream science tells us
is very wrong that's why him and I
connected very very well he was very
outspoken on all the things that we need
to know right and that's why it's hurt
hearing that he had passed
but you know looking at it from a of
course not so sad perspective what
better day could he have passed on than
the Eclipse right then that symbolic day
for him to go and I think one of the
reasons why it hit me so hard as well as
because I sat down with him just a month
ago in Las Vegas during the MUFON
symposium and I had a chance to
interview him on film so I'm greatly
honored that I was one of the last
people to sit down and be able to
interview him and you know his he's
always had a connection to Nordics and
those kinds of extraterrestrial races
himself and me being of a Norwegian
ancestry blue eyes blonde hair and my
family you know I I just always felt
that connection with him because of that
Nordic influence and many other reasons
and the very last day the very last time
that we talked you know in Las Vegas he
getting windy here now he pulled me in
close and he divulged some things to me
that he hasn't spoken too much about in
the public eye he never really shined
the light on just for his own personal
reasons nothing nefarious but he told me
thank you for exposing the exposing the
darkness exposing the blood if you will
those those nasty things that the occult
elite do I'll just let your own mind
imagine what those things are but so he
thanked me and you know we we connected
greatly so I just wanted to basically
make this video honoring him discussing
with you guys my experiences with him
how I find him to be you know pivotal
pivotal in this whole disclosure
movement and his name isn't going away
his research his information is not
gonna go away I think with him passing
you know very shocked very unexpected
but he's absolutely going to be helping
us from the other side and the
information that he did
give to us over those two years is just
going to continue rolling and I will
continue speaking about it you know I
know a lot of people out there are so
you know I'll continue sharing his story
I invite you guys to learn it share his
story and the information he was
providing with your own friends and
family and you know our IP not rest in
peace fly in peace you know fly in peace
William Tompkins peace out guys
